name: Chicken fajita
description: Marinated chicken breast grilled to perfection and served sizzling hot on a cast iron plate with colorful bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Accompanied by Mexican rice, refried beans, fresh lettuce, sour cream, shredded cheese, pico de gallo, and your choice of warm flour or corn tortillas

name: Steak fajita
description: Premium marinated steak strips grilled to your preference and served sizzling on a cast iron plate with fresh bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Served with Mexican rice, refried beans, lettuce, sour cream, cheese, pico de gallo, and warm tortillas

name: Mixed fajita
description: The best of both worlds! Marinated steak and chicken grilled together and served sizzling with colorful bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Complete with Mexican rice, refried beans, fresh toppings, and warm tortillas for the perfect combination

name: Shrimp fajita
description: Plump gulf shrimp seasoned with Mexican spices and grilled to perfection, served sizzling with bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. Accompanied by rice, beans, fresh toppings, and your choice of tortillas for a coastal Mexican experience

name: Pork fajita
description: Succulent pork tenderloin marinated in traditional Mexican spices and grilled to perfection, served sizzling with fresh vegetables. Complete with all the classic accompaniments and warm tortillas for an authentic fajita experience

name: Fajita Texana
description: Our signature triple-meat fajita featuring marinated steak, chicken, and gulf shrimp all grilled together and served sizzling with bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. A feast for sharing with all the traditional accompaniments and fresh tortillas

name: Fajita Hawaiana
description: A tropical twist on our classic fajitas! Marinated steak, chicken, and shrimp grilled with sweet pineapple chunks, bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes. The perfect blend of Mexican tradition with island flavors, served with all the fixings
